strongTSSCIbrbrstrongPotential for Remote Work strongYesbrbrstronguDescriptionbrbrustrongThe SAIC Cloud One program is seeking a cloud engineer a part of a team to engineer maintain and troubleshoot scalable highly available data transport solutions using Apache NiFi clusters and other technologies Cloud One is an existing global interconnected virtualized hybrid and IT infrastructure that hosts mission systems applications services and data in support of DoD Services and Agencies Cloud One incorporates the capabilities of Cloud Service Providers CSPs and DevSecOps principles to provide common services and facilitate cloud application migrations to IL4 IL5 and IL6 AWS and Azure cloud environments This job can be performed remotely anywhere within the USbrbrResponsibilities
